reviews.review: Yes Big Boys All around yes chap chap
I might be silver but I absolute love this game. The formula is classic but refreshing. Every game is different and an absolute blast to play. Very competitive and lovely.
The best competetive fun found on a computer! The fact that I have spent more than a thousand hours getting better and competing is testament to that
